    1.1.sizes

    variables

    mq--mobile

    Since 1.0.0
    $mq--mobile: 480px;
    View source

    Description

    Media query definition for mobile devices, used in css-locks.

    Example

    @include css-locks(font-size, $mq--mobile, $mq--desktop, $font-size--mobile, $font-size--desktop);

    Author

    • Silvestar Bistrović me@silvestarbistrovic.from.hr

    mq--desktop

    Since 1.0.0
    $mq--desktop: 960px;
    View source

    Description

    Media query definition for desktop devices, used in css-locks.

    Example

    @include css-locks(font-size, $mq--mobile, $mq--desktop, $font-size--mobile, $font-size--desktop);

    Author

    • Silvestar Bistrović me@silvestarbistrovic.from.hr

    font-size--mobile

    Since 1.0.0
    $font-size--mobile: 14px;
    View source

    Description

    Default font size on mobile devices, used in css-locks.

    Example

    @include css-locks(font-size, $mq--mobile, $mq--desktop, $font-size--mobile, $font-size--desktop);

    Used by

    • [function] rem

    Author

    • Silvestar Bistrović me@silvestarbistrovic.from.hr

    font-size--desktop

    Since 1.0.0
    $font-size--desktop: 16px;
    View source

    Description

    Default font size on desktop devices, used in css-locks.

    Example

    @include css-locks(font-size, $mq--mobile, $mq--desktop, $font-size--mobile, $font-size--desktop);

    Used by

    • [function] rem

    Author

    • Silvestar Bistrović me@silvestarbistrovic.from.hr

    Since 1.0.0
    $line-height: 1.5;

    modularscale

    Since 1.0.0
    $modularscale: (
  base: 1rem,
  ratio: $major-second
);
    View source

    Description

    Configuration for modular scale

    Example

    @include css-locks(font-size, $mq--mobile, $mq--desktop, $font-size--mobile, $font-size--desktop);

    Links

    • http://www.modularscale.com/

    Author

    • Silvestar Bistrović me@silvestarbistrovic.from.hr

    mq-breakpoints

    Since 1.0.0
    $mq-breakpoints: (
  mobile:  $mq--mobile,
  desktop: $mq--desktop
);
    View source

    Description

    Configuration for media queries

    Example

    @include mq($from: mobile, $until: desktop) {
  color: $color-alpha;
}

    Links

    • https://www.npmjs.com/package/sass-mq

    Author

    • Silvestar Bistrović me@silvestarbistrovic.from.hr

    2.1.locks

    functions

    strip-unit

    Since 1.0.0
    @function strip-unit($value) { ... }
    View source

    Description

    Function for stripping units

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $value

    A value with unit (e.g. 20px)

    		Unit— none

    Returns

    Integer —

    Returns a value without unit

    Example

    font-size: strip-unit(20px);

    Used by

    • [mixin] css-locks
    • [mixin] css-locks
    • [function] rem
    • [function] rem
    • [mixin] ls

    Links

    • https://css-tricks.com/snippets/css/fluid-typography/

    Author

    • Silvestar Bistrović me@silvestarbistrovic.from.hr

    mixins

    css-locks

    Since 1.0.0
    @mixin css-locks($properties, $min-vw, $max-vw, $min-value, $max-value) { ... }
    View source

    Description

    Mixin for creating CSS Locks

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $properties

    A property (e.g. font-size)

    		String— none
    $min-vw

    A minimal view width (e.g. 480px)

    		Unit— none
    $max-vw

    A maximal view width (e.g. 960px)

    		Unit— none
    $min-value

    A minimal value for lock (e.g. 14px)

    		Unit— none
    $max-value

    A maximum value for lock (e.g. 20px)

    		Unit— none

    Example

    @include css-locks(font-size, 480px, 960px, 14px, 20px);

    Requires

    • [function] strip-unit
    • [function] strip-unit

    Links

    • https://css-tricks.com/snippets/css/fluid-typography/

    Author

    • Silvestar Bistrović me@silvestarbistrovic.from.hr

    3.1.helpers

    functions

    rem

    Since 1.0.0
    @function rem($size: 20px, $media: 'desktop') { ... }
    View source

    Description

    Function for converting a value to rem unit

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $size

    A value with unit (e.g. 20px)

    		Unit20px
    $media

    A media, (e.g. 'desktop' or 'mobile')

    		String'desktop'

    Returns

    Unit —

    Returns a value converted in rem; returns 1rem if media is not 'desktop' or 'mobile'

    Example

    font-size: rem(20px, 'mobile');

    Requires

    • [function] strip-unit
    • [function] strip-unit
    • [variable] font-size--desktop
    • [variable] font-size--mobile

    See

    • [variable] color-text

    Author

    • Silvestar Bistrović me@silvestarbistrovic.from.hr

    tracking

    Since 1.0.0
    @function tracking($tracking: 0, $media: 'desktop') { ... }
    View source

    Description

    Function that calculates tracking

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $tracking

    Tracking value without a unit (e.g. 200)

    		Integer0
    $media

    A media, (e.g. 'desktop' or 'mobile')

    		String'desktop'

    Returns

    Unit —

    Returns a tracking value

    Example

    letter-spacing: tracking(200);

    Used by

    • [mixin] ls

    Author

    • Silvestar Bistrović me@silvestarbistrovic.from.hr

    mixins

    ls

    Since 1.0.0
    @mixin ls($tracking: 0) { ... }
    View source

    Description

    Mixin for defining tracking

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $tracking

    Tracking value without a unit (e.g. 200)

    		Integer0

    Example

    @include ls(100);

    Requires

    • [function] tracking
    • [function] strip-unit

    Author

    • Silvestar Bistrović me@silvestarbistrovic.from.hr

    None.

    Author

    tra

    Since 1.0.0
    @mixin tra($transition-duration: $trd, $transition-animation: $tra) { ... }
    View source

    Description

    Mixin for defining transition

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $transition-duration

    A duration of the transition (e.g. 1s)

    		Unit$trd
    $transition-animation

    An easing function of the transition (e.g. linear or cubic-bezier(0.04, 0.88, 0.74, 1.04))

    		String$tra

    Example

    @include tra($trd, $tra);

    Author

    • Silvestar Bistrović me@silvestarbistrovic.from.hr
